name: mansion
story: You are now in a  mansion, and you are sitting in your study room thinking of having an adventurous journey!
nav: press 1 to go to the hot spring, press 2 to go to the cinema and press 3 to go to the harbour

name: hot spring
story: You are at the hot spring now. You are relaxing your body in the warm water
nav: press 1 to go mansion, 2 to go to the cinema, or 3 to go to the hotel

name: harbour
story: You are at the harbour now, admiring a yacht.
nav: Press 1 to go back mansion, press 2 to go to the north pole, and press 3 to go to the secret chamber

name: north pole
story: You are at the north pole now, admiring the  northern lights. You are charting a map of the places you want to take over.
nav: Press 1 to go to the hot spring, Press 2 to go to Ragnarok. Press 3 to go to the flea market

name: hotel
story: You are at a luxorious hotel. You are feeling tired but you have to make a deal first.
nav: press 1 to go to the hot spring, press 2 to go mansion, press 3 to go the creamstone

name: cinema
story: You are at the cinema now, watching the god father movie. You are inspired by it
nav: Press 1  to go mansion. Press 2 to go to skylab. Press 3 to go to head office

name: dancing fountain
story: You arrived at the dancing fountain.Someone is watching you. You had an encounter with the police
nav: Press 1 to go to mansion 2 to go to nallamala forest 3 to go to secret chamber

name: safe
story: you need a key to get to tessaract chest
nav: press 1 to go the cinema, 2 to go to the dancing fountain, 3 to go to dragon triangle

name: fight club
story: You are at the fight club, fighting the thugs. This is where you got your fighting skills from.
nav: Press 1 to go to the flea market, and press 2 to go to mansion and press 3 to go to nallamala forest.

name: secret chamber
story: Your jet arrived at the secret chamber, you met some other mafia members.
nav: Press 1 to go to mansion 2 to go to north pole 3 to go to skylab

name: skylab
story: You are on skylab. It�s time to strategise to build your empire. You have found out about the power of tessaract.
nav: Press 1 to go to the secret chamber 2 to the cosmos pool 3 cosmos bar

name: continental club
story: You are at the Continental Club. You are partying with your family
nav: Press 1 to go to hotel, press 2 to go to north pole and press 3 to go to the Ocean.

name: Ocean
story: You now are at the Ocean, listening to the sound of tides and wind in the moonlight
nav: press 1 to go to the nallamala forest, press 2 to explore the seas press 3 to go to the hot spring

name: circus
story: You came to the circus with your family. Your family memebers are missing. You have to find them�
nav: press 1 to go to the continental club, press 2 to go mansion, press 3 to go to the hot spring

name: dragon triangle
story: You made a dangerous move.You are at dragon triangle, you are struggling to save yourselves from a wreck
nav: press 1 to call secret chamber, 2 to call continental club and 3 to go mansion

name: sea floor
story: Your yacht crashed and sinked into the sea. You are hoping for help
nav: press 1 to go to the nallamala forest, 2 to go to dragon triangle, 3 to the dancing fountain

name: island
story: You sought to steal the tessaract in the map. You joined with the mafia who are on the same mission
nav: press 1 to go to skylab 2 to  continental club or 3 to the fight club

name: flea market
story: You are now in flea market and you found a valuable antique. No knows it's actual worth. You bought it
nav: Press 1 to go to secret chamber. Press 2 to go to dragon triangle, Press 3 to go to the cosmos bar

name: head office
story: You are now at the your office and you have got new jobs to finish
nav: press 1 to go to go to the head office, press 2 to go to secret chamber and press 3 to go to cosmos bar.

name: cosmos bar
story: You are at the cosmos bar, there are a lot of drinks to have. You are drinking like a fish.
nav: Press 1 to go to shaghouse dhabha, 2 to go to creamstone, and 3 to go to safe

name: fire land
story: You realised you are a mutant. You can generate fire but you burnt the room in the process. You are suffocated by the smoke and fire around you
nav: press 1 to go to the nallamala forest, 2 to go to the head office, 3 to go to the harbour

name: cosmos pool
story: While enjoying your drinks by the pools side, you heard about the nelamaliga treasure and where to find it
nav: press 1 to go to the food court, press 2 to see the tessaract tech, press 3 to go to shaghouse dhabha

name: shaghouse dhabha
story: You smell the aroma of indian food ! You enjoy a delicious meal of indian cuisine!
nav: Press 1 to go to the cinema, press 2 to go to the harbour, press 3 to go to the jungle

name: creamstone
story: you are at creamstone, enjoying death by chocolate ice cream while your gang members have killed a man in the back
nav: press 1 to go to dragon triangle, press 2 to go cosmos pool and press 3 to go to hot spring.

name: nallamala forest
story: your  jet crashed in the nallamala forest
nav: press 1 to go to dancing fountain, 2 to go to cosmos bar or 3 to go to wonder land

name: nelamaliga treasure
story: You found the nelamaliga treasure of the Royals! Unlimited amounts of gold is all yours now! You win!

name: tessaract tech
story: You found the secret tessaract tech, you have the most advanced tech in the universe! you win!

name: dark prison
story: You are trapped in the dark prison, you lose!

name: food court
story: You had food from the food court. Your food is poisoned ! You lose!
